description: This file contains unit tests for key-value type classes in a C++ project, utilizing Google Test framework. It tests various functionalities like construction, assignment, comparison, and key validation for template classes such as KeyValueType and TextKeyValueType.

classes.name: KeyValueType<string, string>
classes.description: A template class representing a key-value pair with methods for comparison and key validation.

classes.name: TextKeyValueType<CASESENSITIVE, TextFragment>
classes.description: A template class representing a text-based key-value pair with case sensitivity option.

classes.name: TextFragment
classes.description: A class representing a fragment of text, used as a key or value in the key-value pair tests.

methods.name: operator==
methods.description: Equality comparison operator for KeyValueType objects.

methods.name: operator!=
methods.description: Inequality comparison operator for KeyValueType objects.

methods.name: Key()
methods.description: Returns the key part of the KeyValueType.

methods.name: Value()
methods.description: Returns the value part of the KeyValueType.

methods.name: IsKey()
methods.description: Checks if the provided string matches the key.
